Section.name: About Eswar College of Engineering
Section.description:
Eswar College Of Engineering has been established in 2008 on chilakaluripet road just 5KM from Narasaraopet, Guntur of Andhra Pradesh with a motto to produce such engineers who can contribute to the growth of the nation with their creativity and skills. So to fulfill the motto, the college has made advancement in the field of education technique and infrastructural facility.
The College is affiliated to JNTU-Kakinada and approved by AICTE, New Delhi. Today, the college is counted among one of the best Engineering College in the region as well as whole state. The college is well known for its reputed and highly qualified, experienced faculty and extra curricular activities.
Eswar College of Engineering AP EAPCET Cutoff 2024 is out. The table given below shows the cutoff for Round 1.
